Reviews.Title: SVP Battery For G13 Watch Phone Review
Reviews.Author: Tyrel "Brandon"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for your svp watch phone battery is dead it will renew life in your svp watch phone.

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: NICOLA G.
Reviews.Content: It did not work and when I tried to return it  it's a run-around process.I still didn't get to return it  and lost $20.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: michael covert
Reviews.Content: i just got this battery so i could back up my old one with a new one so i have more music time
